The variables that were not readily available from CataÃÅÃÆo and Mano (2017) were obtained (or constructed) as follows: ÃÂ¢Ãâ¬ÃÂ¢ Exchange rate: we use the official nominal exchange rate between a country iÃÂ¢Ãâ¬Ãâ¢s currency and the USD from the World BankÃÂ¢Ãâ¬Ãâ¢s World Development Indicators (WDI). ÃÂ¢Ãâ¬ÃÂ¢ Tradable GDP: we construct tradable GDP as the sum of Agriculture value added and Industry value added. Both series are expressed in constant local currency units and taken from the WDI.
